description: ChangesandCommentary

ChangesandCommentary
Amended to require each part of storey or fire compartmentusedasaClass9bearlychildhoodcentre be provided with not less than 2 exits.
AmendedtorequirestairwaysorrampsservingClass9b early childhood centres as a required exit to be fire- isolated. An exemption has been included for certain Class 9b early childhood centres.
